text: Olga Bucătaru (March 27, 1942, Suceava – April 10, 2020, Bucharest) was a Romanian film and stage actress.Olga Bucătaru, a profile at aarc.ro In 2002 she was awarded the National Order of Faithful Service, knight class."Decree no. 1.042 (December 13, 2002) of President of Romania about national awards" (retrieved April 12, 2017) She died on April 10, 2020 from a heart attack. ==Filmography (partial list)== * The Mace with Three Seals (1977) - Lady Stanca * Ecaterina Teodoroiu (1978) - Dr. Lucretia * Train of Life (1998) - Femme Wagon ==References== == External links == * Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Romanian film actresses Category:Romanian stage actresses Category:Recipients of the National Order of Faithful Service
title: Olga Bucătaru
